game.name: High On Life 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 은하계의 음모가 인류의 운명을 위협하고 있습니다! 말하는 우주 총과 다양한 팀을 이루어 쏘고, 찌르며 이국적인 장소를 헤쳐나가 보세요. 악당들을 물리치고 사랑하는 종족(인간)을 구해야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An intergalactic conspiracy threatens the fate of humanity! Team up with a wide cast of talking alien guns as you shoot, stab, and skate your way through the exotic locales to take down the bad guys and save your favorite species (humans)!
